title: Utah County Democratic data & organizing notes
text:
Utah County Democratic data & organizing notes
        
        
          A simple place to share local insights, strategy, and practical links for volunteers and organizers.
        

        
          
            Read the blog
          
          
            View tools
          
        
      

      
      
        
          Latest posts
          Short updates. Practical info.
        

        
          
          
            
              Weekly field notes template
              Feb 4, 2026
            
            
              Keep notes consistent: what happened, what data we learned (with source), what changed, and next action.
            
            
              Read more
            
          

          
          
            
              Turnout math (rough planning)
              Jan 28, 2026
            
            
              A quick way to estimate the number of contacts needed for a turnout goal using a simple impact assumption.
            
            
              Read more
            
          

          
          
            
              Messaging: persuasion vs mobilization
              Jan 20, 2026
            
            
              Write separate messages for persuasion and turnout. Keep asks simple and locally specific.
            
            
              Read more

title: Quick Metric: Contact → Show Rate
text:
A simple weekly check: how many scheduled voters actually show up (events, canvass shifts, trainings).
If the show rate drops, try: - confirm the day before - send a map + time estimate - offer a buddy option (bring a friend)

title: Welcome: What This Blog Is For
text:
This is a lightweight place to share Utah County–specific political data and practical strategy.

Keep posts short
Link sources when you can
End with one clear takeaway
